citations.narrative:
The broadwing hawk was provided with a heated perch with a dangling unprotected electric cord. Electrical cords may
become shredded by curious animals, and then be a shock or entanglement hazard. The facility must ensure that
electrical cords are not a hazard to the bird.
Correct by December 11, 2024.

The red tail hawk enclosure does not have any wind sheltered perching sites available. Optional use of protected perching
sites allow for bird choice, which decreases stress, and ensures that the bird is protected from environmental conditions
that may be detrimental to welfare. The facility must ensure that an area for wind sheltered perching is available.
Correct by December 13, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
